testcase.brief: Configure the max length of domain name pattern, verify if can match
testcase.description: Topology to use Description Configure the max length of domain name pattern, verify if can match Pre-condition Set interface eth0 to wan mode Set interface eth1 to access mode and enable mac-learning Eth0 can obtain ip address from DHCP server Disable dhcp client on mgt0 and configure a static ip address Enable DHCP server on interface mgt0.1 Enable DNS server on mgt0.1 Set internal DNS server and external DNS server to mgt0.1 Set internal domain name pattern with the max length(32 chars) to mgt0.1 Set SSID and bind it to interface wifi0 Connect a client to SSID and make client obtain ip address from mgt0.1 Use Wireshark to capture packet on client and DNS server Set filter _ff id 1 dst-port 53 bidirectional Open debug _kdebug fe basic/detail and debug console Test procedure Send DNS request from client and make domain name match the internal domain name pattern, verify if DNS server can works normal Expect result Can match domain name pattern and use internal DNS server to resolution

step.desc: Set eth1 to access mode and enable mac-learning
Enable DHCP server on interface mgt0.1 Enable DNS server on mgt0.1, Set DNS mode to nonsplit of mgt0.1
step.telnet: -v "vlan ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "interface vlan ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server options netmask 255.255.255.0" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server options default-gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server options dns1 ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dns-server int-domain-name ${cvg1.cvg.dns1.domain_maxlen1} ${cvg1.dns1.ip}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dns-server ext-resolve dns1 ${pub.dns2.ip}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server enable" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dns-server enable" -v "interface ${br1.br.lan.int3} shutdown"

step.desc: br1.vpc1 get ip addr from dhcp server of mgt0.1
set br1.vpc1.tif.ip var for vpc1 on BR side
Set filter _ff id 1 dst-port 53 bidirectional,Open debug _kdebug fe basic/detail and debug console
step.telnet: -v "_debug dns" -v "_ff id 1 dst-port 53 bidirectional" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail"
